title: Sophia the Snowflake
description:
Sophia is a snowflake who falls from the sky on a blustery  February day. When she lands on the lawn of a neighborhood boy, she calls on her big family to do him a big favor.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
